108.title:  "A Date with Yesterday"
108.author: editor, George Wildman ; script, Joe Gill ; art, Sanho Kim
notes: First caption: "Lilian Himes came from a small town. She grew up with two spinster aunts, and she never did get accustomed to the modern world outside their house. Then, they died within a few months of each other. She had no one there. There were no jobs and she had to go to the city to find work to support herself. Here, she felt even more out of it than ever."
Time travel story.
